sentences.en: A gang taunted a disabled man.
sentences.cn: 一伙小混混嘲笑一位残疾人。
严重残疾的小儿麻痺症病人

sentences.en: a support group for parents of disabled children
sentences.cn: 帮助残障儿童父母的援助团

sentences.en: Contact with other disabled yachtsmen of like mind would be helpful.
sentences.cn: 和其他志同道合的残疾人帆船运动员接触会有帮助。

sentences.en: His deformity totally disabled him from following his vocation.
sentences.cn: 他的残疾使他完全失去了从事他的职业的能力.

sentences.en: It is our bounden duty to help the disabled.
sentences.cn: 帮助残疾人是我们义不容辞的责任.

sentences.en: Nobody can avoid being disabled by age.
sentences.cn: 谁也无法避免年老体衰.

sentences.en: Old age disabled him for hard work.
sentences.cn: 年迈使他不能胜任繁重工作.

sentences.en: Owners of restaurants would have to equip them to admit disabled people.
sentences.cn: 餐厅老板将必须在餐厅里配备能够接纳残疾人的设施。

sentences.en: She has disabled herself from walking by a fall.
She was disabled from walking by a fall.
sentences.cn: 她跌倒以后连路也不能走了.

sentences.en: Some local authorities and voluntary organizations also run workshops for disabled people.
sentences.cn: 一些当地机构和志愿组织也为残疾人开设了一些工场。

sentences.en: teachers who work with learning disabled children (= children who have problems learning )
sentences.cn: 教有学习障碍的儿童的教师

sentences.en: The accident disabled him for work.
sentences.cn: 这起事故使他丧失了工作能力.

sentences.en: The gym can be used by both able-bodied and disabled people.
sentences.cn: 这家健身房健全和残障人士都可使用。

sentences.en: The plane was critically disabled when one of the engines caught fire.
sentences.cn: 有一台引擎起火,使飞机严重受损.

sentences.en: There are toilet facilities for the disabled.
sentences.cn: 有残疾人士专用的卫生间设施。

sentences.en: They were disabled by age or sickness.
sentences.cn: 他们因年老或疾病而失去了工作的能力.

words.tran_cn: 使失去能力；使残废；使无资格

phrases.tran_cn: 有学习障碍的；无学习能力的

trans.tran_cn: 丧失能力的，残疾的，无效的，不能运转的
trans.tran_en: someone who is disabled cannot use a part of their body properly, or cannot learn easily

trans.tran_cn: 使…失去能力（disable的过去分词）
